name: 20 Second Harvest
description:
20 Second Harvest is a match 3 game where you try to harvest as many vegetables as you can before the sun sets. Can you beat your high score?

Team:

  • Marc - messy code, messy assets (outside of those listed below)
  • Alyblucat - wonderfully atmospheric music

Other assets:

  • Vegetables by KiriuOzoru
  • 7:12 Serif font by Christian Munk
  • Sounds from Zapsplat.com

Built with DragonRuby for the 20 Second Game Jam.
